title: Mass shootings in the U.S. : legality of shooter 's weapons , as of February 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of The Weapon in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.

The maximum Number of incidents 82.0 is found at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and the minimum is found at Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally where Category Of The Weapon is 1.0.
The maximum Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has got 82.0 times higher Number of incidents than the minimum Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of The Weapon in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and lowest at Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of The Weapon in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.

The maximum Number of incidents 82.0 is found at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and the minimum is found at Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally where Category Of The Weapon is 1.0.
The maximum Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has got 82.0 times higher Number of incidents than the minimum Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 4 number of Category Of The Weapons.
Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has the highest Number of incidents and Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally has the lowest Number of incidents.
Category Of The Weapon Unknown/to be determined has the second highest value for Number of incidents.
The difference of Number of incidents between the highest and lowest Category Of The Weapon is 81.0.

Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained is higher than any other Category Of The Weapons with value 82.0, followed by Unknown/to be determined, and Illegally obtained. Down to Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally with the lowest value 1.0.
The lowest value 1.0 at Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally is almost 2.8 times smaller than the average value 29.25.

data.Category Of The Weapon: Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally
